name: Azurill
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Marill from your hand onto Azurill (this counts a evolving Azurill) and remove all damage counters from Azurill.

attacks.name: Delivery
attacks.effect: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
